game.name: Kingdom Dice
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Become a lord in a world of feudal greed in the turn-based economic board game Kingdom Dice. Build an empire, buy lands, collect taxes from friends, trade, and bankrupt everyone around you! (ง •̀_•́)ง
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a lord in a world of feudal greed in the turn-based economic board game Kingdom Dice. Build an empire, buy lands, collect taxes from friends, trade, and bankrupt everyone around you! (ง •̀_•́)ง
